title: Global AI, tech frenzy fuels renewed momentum in Kenya's capital markets
description: Kenya's capital markets are surging on renewed confidence and favorable timing, with global tech optimism a possible boost.

title: OpenAI reportedly planning AI earbuds ahead of more advanced device
description: A new leak suggests OpenAI's first consumer hardware could be AI-powered earbuds, codenamed Dime, offering voice-based assistance and hands-free access to its models. A simpler version may launch first, with advanced devices delayed due to component shortages.

title: OpenAI co-founder Greg Brockman has six ‘advice’ points for his team: says put AI agents first, ‘say no to slop’ and work...
description: Greg Brockman says AI agents should become engineers’ primary tool at OpenAI, urging teams to redesign workflows, protect code quality, and build infrastructure that supports large-scale AI-generated software responsibly.

title: From churches to chatbots: How AI is fusing with religion
description: AI appears to be reshaping how people learn about, interpret and even experience their faith.

title: Clawdbot explained: The AI that lets you buy whatever you’re looking at
description: ClawdBot, now known as Moltbolt, is turning heads by combining artificial intelligence with hands-free shopping. Users can now point their devices, or even smart glasses, at a product, have an AI-assistant identify it and add it to an online cart almost instantly. Unlike general AI tools like ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini, Moltbolt is designed to [...]
